body.description: Take the natural, cleaning and sanitizing power of steam to a variety of hard surfaces in your home with BISSELL® Steam Shot™ Handheld Steam Cleaner. It comes with seven tools, so it works on shower doors, grout, ovens, microwaves, and so much more. The on-demand trigger allows you to control the amount of steam released while cleaning. Steam Shot uses only water to clean, giving you a 100% chemical-free clean, so it’s safe to use around kids and pets when you use it as directed. Plus, every purchase of this steam cleaner helps save pets! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Scrubbing Brush (3) Three color-coded round brushes, designate for specific rooms or for use on different messes. Grout Tool Scrubs and cleans grout across a variety of hard surfaces. Flat Scraper Tool Scrapes hard, stuck-on messes across surfaces like microwaves, stovetops, ovens, and more. Angle Concentrator Tool Directs steam into hard-to-reach areas.

Eliminates 99.9% of Germs Powerful, high-pressure, high-temperature handheld steam cleaner works to sanitize a variety of hard surfaces in your home. *Use as instructed. Results may vary. Tested under controlled laboratory conditions without tools. Perfect cleaning without chemicals Safe to use around kids and pets when used as directed.

For safety, the water tank MUST be depressurized before refilling during use. Unplug your steam cleaner and wait 5 minutes. Press the stream trigger to release all built up pressure inside the tank. When steam is no longer present, all pressure has been released and the water tank is depressurized. If cap is still hot, use an oven mitt to remove. Refill according to user guide instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy Wife, Happy Life – Thanks to Bissell SteamShot!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bissell SteamShot Hard Surface Steam Cleaner for my wife, and I have to say, I haven't seen her this excited about a cleaning tool in a long time. It's become a staple in our household cleaning routine, and for good reason. The only minor hiccup has been with the attachments, but more on that later.Exceptional Cleaning Performance:The Bissell SteamShot has exceeded our expectations in terms of cleaning performance. My wife is thrilled with how it effortlessly tackles dirt, grime, and stains on various surfaces. It’s amazing to see how it sanitizes without the need for harsh chemicals, relying solely on the power of steam. She's particularly fond of using it in the kitchen and bathroom, where it cuts through grease and soap scum like a charm.Ease of Use:She can't stop talking about how user-friendly and convenient the SteamShot is. It's lightweight and easy to maneuver, making the dreaded chore of cleaning less of a hassle. The steam trigger allows for precise control, and the fact that it heats up quickly means she can get to cleaning without any annoying wait times.Natural Sanitization:We have young kids, so using natural methods to sanitize our home is a priority. The SteamShot's ability to clean with just water, transforming it into a powerful cleaning agent, gives us peace of mind. We're reducing our chemical usage without compromising on cleanliness.Versatility for Multiple Surfaces:Another aspect my wife loves is its versatility. Whether it's tile, hardwood, or laminate, the SteamShot works wonders across various hard surfaces, leaving them spotless and streak-free.The Only Downside - Attachments:The only downside, if I had to mention one, is the attachments that come with the product. While they are functional, my wife feels they could be more durable and offer a bit more variety to tackle different types of cleaning tasks more effectively.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Bissell SteamShot Hard Surface Steam Cleaner has been a fantastic addition to our home. Its effectiveness, ease of use, and natural cleaning capability have made it a hit, especially with my wife. While the attachments could see some improvement, the overall performance of this steam cleaner makes it a product we'd happily recommend to anyone looking for an efficient and chemical-free way to clean their home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that it is easy to use and the attachments are great. But be careful, that sucker gets hot. And don't forget to release that steam before opening it to refill it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little machine, needs bigger brushes standard
reviews.reviewText: We had some mold and mildew issues, along with soap scum, in our walk-in shower. We had used several bottled cleaners but they just didn't work. So we sprung for this great little handheld steamer. It is about the half the size of a gallon of milk and very light weight, yet well constructed. It came with multiple extension brushes and and a nice long extension chord, about 10' I guess.The unit is easy to fill. Just push down on the cap and unscrew then fill the little cup that comes with it to the black line. Then pour that into the steamer. Screw the lid on tightly - but not too tight or it will be difficult to get back off.Then plug it in and it heats up to steam pressure in about 5 minutes. A little orange light will come on when its ready. We used the grout cleaning brush and simply scrubbed the grout while releasing some steam every few seconds. It did a great job cleaning the grout. Got all the mold/mildew off and looks like new.The chaulking at the bottome of the tub was worse, however. And the steamer was unable to remove it. So I had to rechaulk that area.It did get the soap scum off the plastic shower floor but it was a lot of work - significant scrubbing strength required. So we'll not use it for that again. But we did have quite a bit of buildup so I think a more powerful steamer with different brushes would have worked.Our overall feeling is that this is a great little steamer. We love it - easy to use and handle. We're keeping it and going to use it for cleaning our stove top, wheel rims, upholestery, etc. Plus tile grout again when needed.This is a great tool to invest in. Highly recommend the Bissel handheld steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sure shot is a Great Shot
reviews.reviewText: This little steamer is amazing. I recently steamed the kitchen floor and I never thought the ground in grease and dirt that had been there for over a decade would come out, bit this little steamer steamed it all the way. The only thing I would have liked was a larger reservoir so you didn't need to refill as often. I was usually able to clean about 4 tiles before I had to refill and depending on the severity, it could go down to only 1, or 2 tiles. Even though you need to refill it a lot, it is well worth it. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Game-Changer for My Home Cleaning Routine!
reviews.reviewText: As a homemaker, keeping my home clean and safe for my family is a top priority. That's why I was absolutely thrilled when I discovered the BISSELL® Steam Shot™ Handheld Hard Surface Steam Cleaner (Model No 2994B). This little powerhouse has truly transformed the way I clean and sanitize various hard surfaces around the house.The first thing that caught my attention is its incredible cleaning and sanitizing power. With 1000 watts of steam power, it effortlessly eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria from a wide range of surfaces. Whether it's the shower doors, grout, ovens, microwaves, or countertops, this steam cleaner does it all. I have peace of mind knowing that I'm creating a safe and healthy environment for my family.The seven included tools are an absolute game-changer. From the jet nozzle to the color-coded round bristle brushes, grout tool, flat scraper tool, and angle concentrator tool, these attachments make tackling different cleaning tasks a breeze. No more struggling with multiple cleaning products or wasting time switching tools – it's all right here in one convenient package.In terms of practicality, the 16-foot power cord gives me a fair amount of reach, though the 360 ml clean tank capacity is not really much.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a 110 volt device! Will not work in India
reviews.reviewText: This is 110volt device made for the US market. Will not work in India. Why does Amazon sell this in India?????
Very satisfied. Highly recommend. Works well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ideal para limpiar polvo y grasa
reviews.reviewText: Si deseas eliminar polvo, grasa o pegamento, este producto es ideal para esas tareas.Ojo... el vapor no elimina sarro, para eso existen otras soluciones.Tampoco combines agua con otros líquidos, el aparato puede dañarse o peor aún, causar un daño a la persona que manipule este aparato con líquidos extremadamente calientes y a presión.
